# RDPipelineColorBlendState

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Pipeline color blend state (used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md).

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

<a id="RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_enable_logic_op"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **enable_logic_op** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_enable_logic_op)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enable_logic_op**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_enable_logic_op**\ (\ )

<a id="RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_logic_op"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_logic_op**\ (\ value\: [LogicOperation](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_LogicOperation)\ )
- [LogicOperation](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_LogicOperation) **get_logic_op**\ (\ )

The logic operation to perform for blending. Only effective if [enable_logic_op](RDPipelineColorBlendState.md#RDPipelineColorBlendState_property_enable_logic_op) is ``true``.
